digest_items.title: Verify API versioning strategy
digest_items.why: Deprecated API versions may have unpatched vulnerabilities
digest_items.fix: Maintain clear deprecation timeline and force upgrades for old versions

digest_items.title: Implement security incident response plan
digest_items.why: Prepared response reduces damage and recovery time from breaches
digest_items.fix: Document procedures, assign roles, and conduct regular drills

digest_items.title: Use secure cookie flags
digest_items.why: Insecure cookies can be stolen via XSS or transmitted over HTTP
digest_items.fix: Set HttpOnly, Secure, and SameSite flags on all cookies

digest_items.title: Use HSTS headers
digest_items.why: HTTP Strict Transport Security forces browsers to only connect via HTTPS

digest_items.title: Verify SSL certificate validity
digest_items.why: Expired certificates break HTTPS and expose users to MITM attacks
digest_items.fix: Set up automated renewal with Let's Encrypt or monitor expiry dates
